column2: Writing user input directly to the DOM allows for a cross-site scripting vulnerability.
Reinterpreting text from the DOM as HTML can lead to a cross-site scripting vulnerability.
column4:
[["DOM text"|"relative:///public/javascripts/chat_ui.js:10:17:10:40"]] is reinterpreted as HTML without escaping meta-characters.

column1: Uncontrolled data used in path expression
column2: Accessing paths influenced by users can allow an attacker to access unexpected resources.
